dublin_core.dcvalue: The authors present some data on the effects of electromagnetic fields EMF generated by mobile phones on the nervous system The main attention was paid to the usefulness of some neurophysiological methods such as electroencephalography EEG multimodality evoked potentials MEP and event related potentials ERP in the evaluation of the bioelectrical activity of the brain The majority of the cited articles underline the difficulties in the evaluation of adverse effects of EMF generated by mobile phones which can result from their nonspecific influence on biological structures
[ Effects of electromagnetic fields generated by mobile phones on the nervous system].
